Sadly the game is slowly dying, but still a fun game to just vibe with the bros.
10/10
Excelente FPS, Para los Vieja Escuela del 1.6, jajaja la mejor saga de juegos fps de la historia!

there are no wizards , goblins or imaginary creatures that eat you and transform or any of that bull crap. it's man to man combat. on an even playing field. you can play 1 on 1 or get in a game with 50 players. the scale of the weapons is dead on. i 've been playing 15 years. tried other game always come back to counter-strike source. i recommend it to all gamer's ..it's simple too  no building this or making towns or being controlled by other players. get in, buy a gun, and start playing . simple,exiting and fun. thanks
